validation.effectiveUntilAfterFrom: Effective until must be >= effective from

warnings.overlappingTiers: Warning: There are overlapping price ranges
warnings.missingTiers: Warning: There are missing price ranges
warnings.missingFinalTierDescription: The system requires at least one final tier with maxQuantity = null (unlimited) to cover all remaining cases.
warnings.missingFinalTierExample: Example: Final tier could be "≥ 50 kWh" or "≥ 50 m³" with maxQuantity left empty.
warnings.overlappingDescription: The following tiers have overlapping ranges:
warnings.overlappingAdjust: Please adjust min/max of tiers to avoid overlap.
warnings.gapsDescription: The following ranges are not covered by any tier:
warnings.gapFromUp: From {from} onwards {apartment} - Need final tier (maxQuantity = null)
warnings.gapsAdjust: Please add tiers to cover these ranges or adjust max of previous tier.

notes.title: Note:
notes.orderApplied: Tiers are applied in order from low to high
notes.rangeCalculation: Tier is calculated when usage quantity is within min - max range
notes.unlimitedMax: If max = null, tier applies to all quantities from min onwards
notes.effectiveDate: Effective date determines which tier is used at calculation time

errors.loadFailed: Unable to load pricing tiers list

confirm.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete pricing tier {tierOrder}?
confirm.noLastTierWarning:
Warning: After saving, the system will not have a final pricing tier (maxQuantity = null).

Do you want to continue? The system requires at least one final tier to cover all cases.

notes.title: Note
notes.newPriceApplies: New price will be applied to new card registrations

notes.suspendPrice: You can suspend price application by setting isActive = false

errors.loadFailed: Unable to load card pricing list

empty.title: No tenant deletion requests
empty.description: You can create a tenant deletion request if needed

notes.buildingStatus: System will automatically set building status to DELETING
notes.unitsDeleted: All units will be gradually deleted
notes.buildingArchived: After all units deleted → Building status = ARCHIVED
notes.tenantArchived: After all buildings deleted → Tenant status = ARCHIVED

messages.approveSuccess: ✅ Tenant deletion request approved! System will start processing.

TenantOwnerBuildings.title: Buildings Being Deleted
TenantOwnerBuildings.description: Manage buildings in the deletion process. When all units are deleted, you can complete building deletion.

empty.title: No buildings being deleted
empty.description: All your buildings are operating normally

progress.title: Apartment Deletion Progress:
progress.completed: ✅ All units deleted! Can complete building deletion.

confirm.complete:
Are you sure you want to complete deletion of building "{name}"?

Building will change to ARCHIVED status.

modal.title: Inspection Details
modal.startInspectionDesc: Click the button below to start the equipment inspection. After starting, you will be able to enter the condition and notes for each equipment item.
modal.noEquipmentDesc: Equipment list will be created automatically when inspection starts. Please click "Start Inspection" or refresh the page.
modal.itemsNotReadyDesc: Please click the "Refresh" button above to reload the equipment list after the system has finished creating it.
modal.tempFormDesc: You can enter equipment condition now. Data will be saved when the equipment list is created.
modal.tempFormNote: 💡 Data will be automatically saved when the equipment list is created. Please click "Refresh" to check.
modal.previewAssets: Equipment list will be created automatically when inspection starts. Below is the list of equipment in the unit:
modal.noAssignment: ⚠️ No assignment for this cycle. Meter readings will not be saved to the reading cycle.
modal.noMeters: This apartment has no electricity/water meters.

item.noPrice: ⚠️ No original price information available for this equipment
item.repairCostPlaceholder: Enter cost or leave for auto-calculation

costExplanation.damaged: Auto-calculated: 30% of original price ({purchasePrice} VND × 30% = {repairCost} VND)
costExplanation.repaired: Auto-calculated: 20% of original price ({purchasePrice} VND × 20% = {repairCost} VND)

modal.noPricingTiers: No pricing tiers available for calculation

errors.invalidIndex: Meter reading must be greater than or equal to 0

success.completeWithReadings: Completed equipment inspection and {readingCount} meter readings
success.assignmentCreated: Automatically created assignment for this cycle
success.invoiceGenerated: Automatically generated invoice for equipment damage

warnings.itemsNotReady: Equipment list is being created. Please click "Refresh" in a few seconds.
warnings.invoiceGenerationFailed: Completed inspection but failed to automatically generate invoice
warnings.cannotStartBeforeDate: Cannot start inspection yet. Scheduled inspection date: {date}

errors.cannotStartBeforeDate: Cannot start inspection yet. Scheduled inspection date: {date}
